features.name: Authentication System
features.description: Complete authentication system with Supabase integration, social login (Apple, Google), guest mode, role-based access control, and secure token management

features.name: Car Management System
features.description: Comprehensive car listing, search, filtering, and management system with image upload, availability tracking, and host management

features.name: Booking System
features.description: Complete booking management with date selection, payment processing, booking history, and status tracking

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Stripe payment integration with multiple payment methods, currency conversion, and secure transaction processing

features.name: Real-time Messaging
features.description: Chat system with real-time messaging, message persistence, and notification system

features.name: Favorites and Saved Items
features.description: User favorites system with lists, saved cars, and persistent storage

features.name: Location and Maps
features.description: Location-based services with Google Maps integration, geolocation, and nearby car search

features.name: Search and Discovery
features.description: Advanced search functionality with filters, recommendations, and discovery features

features.name: Host Dashboard
features.description: Host management dashboard with car management, booking overview, and statistics

features.name: Document Management
features.description: Document upload, verification, and management system for user verification and rental requirements

features.name: Dispute Resolution
features.description: Dispute management system for handling rental conflicts and issues

features.name: Insurance Management
features.description: Insurance tracking and management for rental vehicles

features.name: Review and Rating System
features.description: User review and rating system for cars and hosts

features.name: Availability Management
features.description: Car availability tracking and calendar management

features.name: Rental Management
features.description: Complete rental lifecycle management from booking to completion

features.name: Settings and Preferences
features.description: User settings, preferences, and app configuration management

features.name: Network and Offline Support
features.description: Network connectivity management, offline storage, and data synchronization

features.name: Performance and Monitoring
features.description: Performance optimization, error logging, and app monitoring

features.name: Security and Audit
features.description: Security auditing, data protection, and compliance features

features.name: Localization and Internationalization
features.description: Multi-language support and localization features

features.name: Deep Linking and Sharing
features.description: Deep link handling, content sharing, and URL management

features.name: Voice and Accessibility
features.description: Voice search capabilities and accessibility features

features.name: UI Components and Widgets
features.description: Reusable UI components, custom widgets, and design system

features.name: Backend API (Strapi)
features.description: Strapi-based backend with RESTful APIs for all major features

features.name: Database and Data Management
features.description: Database schema, migrations, and data management utilities
